channel.title: Comments on: SQL Saturday #67 Chicago 2011: Have Fun Storming the Castle!
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Jes Schultz Borland (grrlgeek)
item.dc:creator: Jes Schultz Borland (grrlgeek)
item.description: Becky - The presentation will be available online, and I'll definitely give it for MADPASS in the future! Maybe a double feature in April? Ha!
item.content:encoded: Becky – The presentation will be available online, and I’ll definitely give it for MADPASS in the future! Maybe a double feature in April? Ha!

item.title: By: Becky
item.dc:creator: Becky
item.content:encoded:
Sorry I’ll miss your presentation, Jes, it’s Dad’s birthday this weekend so family matters take precedence!

I hope you’ll repeat part of this at Madpass someday or have the presentation available on line!

item.title: By: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.dc:creator: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.description: Don't worry David. I'll get double the heckling out for both of us during her session ;-)
item.content:encoded: Don’t worry David. I’ll get double the heckling out for both of us during her session üòâ

item.title: By: David Stein
item.dc:creator: David Stein
item.description: I'm looking forward to meeting you. Unfortunately, we're presenting at the same time so I won't be able to watch yours.
item.content:encoded: I’m looking forward to meeting you. Unfortunately, we’re presenting at the same time so I won’t be able to watch yours.

item.title: By: Jes Schultz Borland (grrlgeek)
item.dc:creator: Jes Schultz Borland (grrlgeek)
item.content:encoded:
Chrissie – thanks! I will

Mike – I’ll get you in on the email loop.

Naomi – I believe registration is closed, but you could email sqlsaturday67@sqlsaturday.com to see if you could still get in.

David – Next time, you’ll have make a road trip. Or organize your own. üòâ

item.title: By: Mike Reigler
item.dc:creator: Mike Reigler
item.description: I'm look foward to it too. Count me in for the group run Sunday morning.<br />
